Text: The toughest job Dear Jeffrey for startup managers these days is raising money and we can help With ideas and introductions And you can get both by spending just one day out of the office Todays funding environment is harsh we know that and investors are both more cautious and more demanding Yet theres money to be had and weve put together a one day conference of those who know how to get it Come learn from the most active investors in laterstage rounds From CEOs who have found new money in the last few months From hardtoreach experts like Tracy Lefteroff the Global Managing Partner of PriceWaterhouseCoopers Venture Capital Practice Or J Sanford Miller a cofounder of Thomas Weisel Partners most recently appointed Managing Director with i one of the most active followon funders with deals since June alone Be sure to check out the site as more and more speakers accept their invitations I hope your calendar allows you to join the other CEOs and Investors on February To register your place and hear these and other leading experts please link to followon today and complete the online registration form VentureWires last companybuilding summit in November filled quickly so please act promptly If you have any questions please contact me by voice on x or email at I look forward to hearing from you Best Regards Allan Allan Cunningham Managing Director Events VentureWire PS If you choose to NOT receive email promotions from us please follow this link ecancelSolicitaspe NRONCOM Expansion Plans Raising followon capital Santa Clara Calif February followon
